Text.Page:
! You made it, too!

The Exodor...
I've never seen it come so close to the ground.

I heard that the Exodor was to blame for all the Murderwings and Mournwings. I wonder if those are the only living creatures aboard...

Well, the Mysterium couldn't stop the crystallization.

So the federation decided to destroy the Exodor. However...what if the Exodor is our only clue to stop the crystallization?
